story:
Hello, my name is Sean Christopher Dockery and I am a New-Age music composer.  I am trying to raise funds for a proper promotion of my newest album, Sean Christopher (featuring Andrew Sords) - Transcendence.  The promotion will be with New Vision Promotions, which will cost approximately $1700 (please see the breakdown of the costs below).  I would also like to advertise the album on Echoes, which is one of the largest broadcasters of New Age music in the world.  One week of advertising is approximately $750. 

Transcendence is a New-Age album which features beautiful violin performances by renowned concert violinist Andrew Sords (www.andrewsords.com).  The album also features beautiful children & adult choirs.  Transcendence took me the better part of 1 year to compose, arrange, and produce and I honestly believe that it is my best work to date. 

I used a similar promotion for my last, Sojourns, and it made a huge impact on getting my album to most of the New-Age music broadcasters in the world, which lead to my music being heard by a whole lot of people…..which is the reason I keep writing.  My wife (Ann Marie) and I were in a better financial situation at that particular time and didn’t have a baby to support, which we do now, so we had no problems back then in pulling out a credit card to finance that promotion.  Now that we have our beautiful baby-boy we cannot afford to get into more debt to do a proper promotion on my newest CD……hence the reason Ann and I thought that Indiegogo could possibly be the answer to our prayers regarding this…..since the costs of producing the album has exhausted our saving for the time being.

Every penny literally would help us in our goal with the album.  Even if you cannot afford anything, just letting your friends and family know about our Indiegogo campaign would be a huge help.  Also, if you know anyone who enjoys New-Age music please send them to my website at www.SeanChristopher.com.  Every CD I sell will help in our cause.  

If I fall short of my goal I will still do the New Vision promo (as long as I can raise at least close to half the $1700 needed for that) we would then, hesitantly, pull put a credit card out to complete this, because having my album heard by lovers of New-Age music is extremely important to Ann and I.  If Ann and I are fortunate enough to exceed the financial goals here on Indiegogo, we will use that to pay for extra advertising time on Echoes.  

Thank you very much for looking at my Indiegogo project.    

God-bless,

Sean Christopher Dockery

_______________________________________________________

Breakdown of the New Vision Promotion cost:

New Vision Promotion

Radio Promotion Services for Sean Dockery

2013 Album release -- Transcendence

 

New Vision Promotion will mail out 144 Demo CDs

Sent to 144 Stations/Programs including 4 Reviewers:  $1295

 

New Vision will perform follow-up promotion and tracking over a 3 and a half month period. Four (4) progress reports will be given to client.

 

Cost Breakdown:

 

Domestic Shipping Costs: 119 domestic x $2.24 =         $266.56

 

Shipping to 27 international stations:

 

20 international x approx $9.45  =                 $189.00

(i.e. Spain, Netherlands, UK, Australia, etc)

5 Canadian stations X $5.25  =                      $26.25

 

Bubble mailers: 144 x .27 =                           $38.88

 

Copies cost and 3 labels per packet =            $16.54

(Address label, return label, CD sticker)

 

  • Sub Total: $1813.00 -Minus $100 discount = 1732.23

Sub Total: $1813.00 -Minus $100 discount = 1732.23

story:
**Notes on shipping: for the perks that require shipping, please don't forget to add it into your contribution! If you forgot that, please just make a no perk contribution for the correct amount! Thank you!

You may have seen me about your town. I am the self-produced vocalist, romantic polyglot born in San Francisco, bred in New York City, and fed in Paris, the City of Lights.

For years, I have funded all of my music endeavors, studio time, and mixing sessions.

This past year, my single "Psychosomatic Love" hit the Northern California airwaves.

I now need your help to finance the official music video to my hit single, and make it a global sensation!

Beginnings in Paris, radio play in Northern California, and soon in a home near you!

Hitchcockian and psychological, "Psychosomatic Love" began upon seeing a beautiful girl on a rainy Parisian Metro ride. Brief dialogue, a date in the park, and failed attempts to kiss, then to remeet, the romance went nowhere fast, leaving me a tad sad, head in hand, and eventually pen in pad, walking about the majestic town obsessively searching for this elusive beauty.

With a bit of a broken heart, and yearning for fulfillment, the never-begun never-ended love story gave me the material for a great song. And thus, in a small Parisian bedroom, crooning words of desire, was born the early draft to my hit single, "Psychosomatic Love," for which, after relocating continents, 2 years of reworking, and being featured on the radio, I am finally making the music video!

I could not be more excited... And so should you.

(Drumroll...)

Alfred Hitchcock.

I am a huge fan of Mr. Hitchcock, the suspense king, and particularly of his masterpiece, Psycho, a huge influence for this video.

Alfred Hitchcock

Like a great Hitchcock film, the video will be suspenseful from the get go.

A touch autobiographical, the video will show me spotting off in the distance, in the middle of downtown San Francisco, the beautiful silhouette of a fleeting woman.

I follow her, further investigating who this beautiful creature may be, finally finding her in the most remote and cinematic of places: an isolated motel.

We found a location, a VACANT MOTEL, in the middle of California, Hitchcockian regalia and cinematic quality intact, where a great part of the video will be shot. I cannot stress the importance and beauty of this motel, preserved in 1960's style. I am super excited for this alone.

The other part of the music video will be shot in studio, where landscapes will be projected onto a white wall as, sitting in a classic lowrider, I simulate driving across the projected Northern California Coast, flowers in hand, hair in the wind, yearning to finally meet my destined love, one-on-one!

This driving sequence is inspired by Quentin Tarantino's Kill Bill Vol. 2, when Thelma is driving to seek her vengeance. Tarantino plays homage to classic films while giving it a new spin, by placing Thelma in a studio, projecting the pre-recorded footage, a vintage touch in our modern age.

And a major part of the team is here, to make this vision come true. Jeremy Peel, creative, art and music video director is onboard to co-direct this video!


Jeremy Peel
Music Video Director and Cinematographer
Check out Jeremy's work www.jeremypeel.com

We've gathered a complete film crew consisting of friends in the film business who have offered their support for this project.

Much to be invested and more to be gained. The cinematic video calls for a cinematic budget (a 4-minute cinematic budget that is).

All of the money received will be going to the production and completion of this music video.

Locations are often the most expensive, yet the most important aspect of film making. Here are the lowest costs we've managed to obtain for the production of the epic video:

  • Motel Location: $4000 for 24 hours
  • Studio: $1000 for 10-hour day
  • Lowrider Car: $500 for a 10-hour day
  • Cinema Quality Camera and Lens Package with Support Rig: $1875 (special favor rate!) per weekend
  • Transportation (equipment and crew) and feeding our volunteer crew: $500
  • Post-Production Costs: Did you know that a basic edit for a 4-minute music video takes at least 30-40 hours of work? There is compositing, special effects, and color grading for a high-concept video such as this one, adding up to 80-120 hours of work. Although a friend has volunteered to help, this significant time investment deserves a little bit of compensation.

We will begin shooting 4 weeks after this campaign ends. This gives us ample time to prepare every scene, book the locations, gear, crew, and extras.

The video will be released and ready for global exposure early 2014.


A lot of great personalized perks here my dears. For every dollar that you donate, you get a bit more Psychosomatic Loving in return.

Exclusive download link to my single + Special thank you on my Facebook page.

Digital Download link to my debut EP first day of release + Special thank you on my Facebook page.

I will send you a personalized Psychosomatic poem including your name, some rhymes, words and lines of mind entertaining imagery
+ the exclusive download link to my single
+ special thank you on my Facebook page

Special thank you call and phone convo for your support!
+ digital download link to my debut EP first day of release
+ special thank you on my Facebook page.

I will send you a personalized Psychosomatic poem
+ digital download link to my debut EP first day of release
+ special thank you on my Facebook page.

Exclusive digital download to my second single, INSANE, off of my debut EP, one week before it is released (special sneak peek here!)


+ my debut EP upon release
+ personalized Pyschosomatic poem
+ special thank you on my Facebook page.

I will dedicate to you a personal poem with all original drawings, maybe a touch romantic
+ download link to my debut EP day of release
+ special thank you on my Facebook page.

Send me a digital photo, I will include you in my personalized drawing, placing you within the Psychosomatic ambiance!

Early download link to my debut EP before its Official Release + exclusive download link to a personal recorded thank you with spoken words of wisdom
+ personal poem with all original drawings
+ special thank you on my Facebook page.

I will leave you a personalized voicemail thanking you for your support, singing the hook of "Psychosomatic Love",
+ Download link to my debut EP 1 day before Official Release
+ personal poem
+ drawing

I will send you an exclusive CD mix of the 15 most influential songs in my life. In this special, very personal and eclectic mix (from pop to jazz to Latin ballads), I will be individually introducing these songs which have played an essential and formulative part in my life and music. This special mix is bound to make you discover, dance, and fall in love with music in the way I fell in love upon discovering them. Also included will be drawings, descriptions of the songs, and personal anecdotes of how these songs are woven into my life. I will promise that you will be discovering tons of new artists and music.
+ ROMANCE AT THE DISCO PACKAGE


I will take you around the city that saw my birth, show you my very hip neighborhood, and invite you to some delicious tea. We'll lounge in the park, discuss music, life and love, and explore some of my favorite places to meet and greet in the city by the bay. (You must provide your own means of transportation to the San Francisco area.)

I will invite you to dinner at my favorite San Francisco gourmet palace, delighting in a glass of Chardonnay, as we glow in the lights by the bay. Similar to the daytime fun, but the night has more cachet! If you're still awake, and in the mood, we will go listen to some great live music. (You must provide your own means of transportation to the San Francisco area.)

I will perform "Psychosomatic Love" live at your house, cook you the best honey almond baked fish, my special dish, and make you a special wish. (If you live ouside of San Francisco, traveling costs must be covered).

You will be featured in the official PSYCHOSOMATIC LOVE music video. You will be able to hang with myself and the film crew, eat some snacks, enjoy some laughs, and appear in the official music video (you must provide your own means of transportation to the San Francisco area).

You will be featured in the official INSANE music video. You will be able to hang with myself and the film crew, eat some snacks, enjoy some laughs, and appear in the official music video (you must provide your own means of transportation to the San Francisco area).

You will be present at one of my studio mixing sessions + featured in the 'INSANE' music video
Baked fish package + hanging about the city with me for a day.

Really appreciate your visiting my campaign and giving interest to my project! It means a lot to me!

Please believe I've been through the tough times and I understand not being able to contribute monetarily.

But there is still so much you can do (by email, face-to-face, via cellphone communication, conversation, and text communication):

  • Point people to this page
  • Email your friends, family, and lovers about my campaign
  • Post a link to my campaign on your Facebook page
  • Share the Psychosomatic campaign using the IndiGogo share tool
  • Encourage friends to check out my music (SoundCloud) and stay up to date on music news via my Facebook.
  • Halfway through the campaign, follow up with anyone you've previously talked to about the campaign and make sure they've donated.

I couldn't thank all of you enough, and I'm super excited to share this music video with you!

story:
"Wait.. What is this ?" 


Telemark is a Swedish band fusing electronic elements with guitars, acoustic drums and and dark, introspective lyrics. 

From touring extensively as musician in bands such as Aesthetic Perfection, Fucking Werewolf, Dubmood, Synthetical, Maskinoperatör (etc) through out the years I (Elliott Berlin) gathered some of the best musicians I know and explained my vision to combine the groove and power from the dance floor with the unmistakable fury of a real rock band. 
Drawing influences from bands like Blondie, Metric, Refused all the way to Nitzer ebb and Combichrist this album started to take form. Over a year later, it´s almost finished. 

https://www.facebook.com/telemarkmusic

Telemark is
Elliott Berlin - Vocals & keys
Mats Jansson - Guitars
Martin Svensson - Drums 
Johan Forsell - Guitars 

Now What ?

Ok, so we still need your help:

  • We want to make this album appear not only on the internet, but also in physical format. CD seems to be the preferred choice and we don´t want to be confusing. 
    Printing CD´s costs around €1000, which is way beyond our reach.
    And then there is artwork, mastering and so on..
    We want to make a beautiful booklet and have our songs mixed and mastered by professionals as far as money allows. The more money, the better the product ! 
  • In return for something as mundane as money we offer gifts only we can give you; 
    of course receiving the album is a perk, but there is more; studio items we´ve used, live show memorabilia and other exciting things.
  • Now, should we not reach our full goal we will still use all the money to perfect our product! Remember, the album is already recorded but it can be fine tuned by mixing and mastering artists, producers. Covering the costs for printing, artwork and such is base one, everything over will add cherries to the ice-cream, so to speak.

More info on perks will come in the next few days  !

The Impact

We feel what we do is important.
Why ?
Well because 

  • We believe art is imperfect. It needs to breath. We don´t want to oblige the "rules of creating hits" or genre-jumping to build fame. 
    We believe our music has an audience that will enjoy it for what it is. 
    For who we are.
  • Without at least one released album booking agents won´t touch a band.
    We feel the need to tour, not because of touring it self or getting wasted in foreign countries, but because we feel at our best on stage, in front of an audience.
    We think you will agree    .

So please... 

Help us by pledging and supporting us! 
Even if it only means you´re sharing our cause it means other people will see it.
And we need people to see us ! 

Please use the indiegogo share tool and like us on Facebook ! https://www.facebook.com/telemarkmusic

story:
Meet Sonic Love Child

We love to play music together and sharing our music with others makes us happy. If you've been to one of our gigs, you know that you leave feeling better than when you arrived. Our fans/friends have inspired us to record some of our favorite tunes so they can enjoy them at any time.  We also want to share our inspiration with a wider audience because each time we've played a new venue, we've been blessed with new fans.

  • Sonic Love Child is:
    Dave Alderson (vocals, guitar, fiddle+ mandolin)
    Nikki Navratil (vocals+percussion)
    Mark Hoornbeek (guitar, mandolin+vocals)
    John Runge (bass+vocals)
    Shirley Fors (vocals)

A little more about us:

  • We released our 1st EP (Old is the New New) in 2011 and produced a benefit CD featuring Minnesota artists, including SLC, in late 2012 (We Love to Be Free). 
  • For four and a half years, we've been gigging and building our fan base through public concerts and private events in the Twin Cities, Greater Minnesota, and Wisconsin. 
  • Our recent studio sessions have yielded about 11 tracks, but we still need to master and duplicate the CDs.  By contributing to this Indiegogo campaign, you become our partner, helping us to share our passion for these great tunes with more music lovers.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to master the tunes, then design and create artwork for the package before pressing CDs to complete this project. Our estimates put the total cost of this project at $1,750. We are fronting the costs and hope to recoup them through this campaign. 
  • We've got fantastic perks for you! $5 will get you an e-hug. $15 gets you a shout-out at one of our live gigs. For $30, you get a signed copy of the CD.  Check out the Perks sidebar for all the details!

The Impact

  • By contributing to this campaign, you'll be helping independent musicians make a living through recording and playing music. Donating your money to our project means we'll be able to spend more time promoting our CD and getting more gigs. We'll be able to reach even more people with our music! 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We can always use your help to spread the word about Sonic Love Child. Share our status updates on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/soniclovechild
  • Use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word via social networks & email! 

Thanks a million! We love you!

story:
Hi! We are Lara Hope & The Ark-Tones, a Rockabilly & Rhythm n' Blues band from Kingston, NY. We pride ourselves on incorporating our traditional influences, while putting our own spin on things. We've been working really hard and writing new music for our first full length record "Luck Maker", and now we are here asking you to help us make this project come to life!

We've created this Indiegogo campaign to raise money for the recording of "Luck Maker". The crowd funding platform allows us to retain the copyrights to our music without handing them over to a record label. It includes the cost of studio time, hiring extra musicians like horn and string players, pressing CD's and vinyl and the postage required to send it all out to YOU!

We'd like to keep it local and record this album here in the Hudson Valley which, as luck would have it, is home to some of the most top notch recording studios in the industry. We will be accepting pledges through the rest of 2013, and plan on hitting the studio in January of 2014 in order to have the album out to you by May of 2014!

In exchange for your pledge, you can get anything from a pre-order of the CD or vinyl, to a guitar lesson from Chris, to even a haircut from our Master Barber Matt. If you REALLY REALLY like us, you can get a performance from us at your house!

Thank you in advance for all your time and your help. And remember: SUPPORT INDEPENDENT MUSIC!!

story:
Vi vil beholde Redrum i Hammerfest!

Det er bare en uke igjen til Cato Eriksen tar frem slegga og knuser Redrum. Inventaret legges ut for salg og scenen der vi alle har hatt store musikkopplevelser forsvinner fra byen. 

Det er utrolig trist. Vi kan ikke la det skje. Vi trenger hjelp til å beholde Redrum. Vi trenger din hjelp til å få på plass egenkapital. 

Hvis 400 personer betaler en tusenlapp hver har vi det vi trenger!

Det må vi klare å hoste opp sammen i oljebyen Hammerfest!

Hvis det ikke blir kjøp, får du tilbake pengene dine - minus noen prosenter som indiegogo tar.

Hvem er vi?

Det begynte med at Caroline Greiner intervjuet Vibeke og Cato på Redrum til avisa. Da forstod hun at det neste helg er slutt for Redrum. Caroline er glad i musikk, festivaler, konserter og gode opplevelser. Derfor fikk hun panikk. 
Hun har erfaring med å drive bedrift i Hammerfest. Hun startet og eier Gründersenteret Verk og lokalavisa Hammerfestingen sammen med Synnøve Aukan og Edel Maria Brynjulfsen. 
Det er ikke Verk som firma som gjør dette, men vi gjør det i Verk sin ånd. Vi vil ha Redrum for å trives i Hammerfest. 
Vi vil ha en levende by, med møteplasser og steder der vi alle får gode opplevelser.
Dette tiltaket er i vår lokalpatriotiske ånd. Det er en dyktig driver med på laget, men arbeidsituasjonen gjør at vi ikke går ut med navnet enda. 
Hvordan eierkonstellasjonen blir er fortsatt i startgropa. 

Nå må vi se om vi klarer å engasjere deg nok til at du bidrar med ditt. 

Alle monner drar!

Hva trenger vi og hva får du igjen?

  • Vibeke og Cato selger Redrum for 1,6 millioner kroner. 
  • Banken finansierer ikke mer enn 50 prosent av kjøpesummen.
  • Vi klarer å få opptil 400 000 fra annet hold, men trenger de siste 400 000  for å få kjøpe Redrum. 

  • Det er nå eller aldri. 
  • Bidra med det du kan og behold en av norges beste rockescener og byens beste utested.


Hva er Redrum for deg?

Hva er Hammerfest uten Redrum. 

Redrum er en kultur. Det er rockekonserter. Det er bolyst. Det er lærlingeplasser og arbeidsplasser. Det er kjærlighet og galskap. Det er musikk. Det er deg og meg. Det er rockn roll. 

Redrum er mere enn en vanlig arbeidsplass. 

Som Vibeke selv sier det:

Her har mange unge mennesker fått vokse opp, og lært mye om arbeidslivet. 

Redrum har tatt imot mange elever fra barne, ungdom, og videregående skole. 

De har fått lære viktigheten av arbeidsmoral, de har fått lære om kontrakter og arbeidsrutiner. 

De har fått litt "kjeft" underveis, slik at de vet hvor grensen går for hvordan en opptrer i arbeidslivet. 

De er blitt sett, de har fått trøst, de har møtt forståelse og de er blitt stor pris på av mæ & Cato. 

De er blitt fantastiske arbeidstakere, for framtidige arbeidsplasser. 

Mange av de er ute å studerer, men de skal hjem til Hammerfest å jobbe <3 

Vi er en egen redrum familie, hvor sorg og glede går hånd i hånd :) 

Redrum er ikke en vanlig uteplass, hvor øl, vin og brennevin står i fokus. 

-vi har opplevelsen som fokus!

Og alle skal ha det bra, de på jobb, gjester og artister. 

-det har vi vel lykkes ganske godt med, sier Vibeke Nilsen,


Hjelp oss beholde alt dette i Hammerfest!
story_txt:

De er blitt sett, de har fått trøst, de har møtt forståelse og de er blitt stor pris på av mæ & Cato. 
De er blitt fantastiske arbeidstakere, for framtidige arbeidsplasser. 
Mange av de er ute å studerer, men de skal hjem til Hammerfest å jobbe <3 
Vi er en egen redrum familie, hvor sorg og glede går hånd i hånd :)

-vi har opplevelsen som fokus!
Og alle skal ha det bra, de på jobb, gjester og artister.

Hjelp oss beholde alt dette i Hammerfest!

story:
Nashville Rescue Missions and The Next Door, helping women, children and men off the streets! 

My name is Ashley Martin, I am a singer songwriter from Ohio and Nashville. Six years ago I was living in Nashville attending Belmont University and working as a hostess at Big River Brewery (now Rock Bottom) by the Honky Tonks. My employer hired one homeless person per year to encourage and support them in getting back on their feet. Little did I know when I came into work that night my life would be changed forever! Wendy was hired as a new hostess that I was to train. As the night progressed she shared her story with me. I realized when our shift was over she had no place to go home to. I offered for her to stay with me! I was 19 at the time and needed help guiding her off past habits that I had no clue how to handle! So I went to the advisors at Belmont and they referred me to "The Next Door" for assistance.  They took Wendy in the very next day and gave her the support she needed! 

Two years after I wrote a song about Wendy and it was chosen to be on my first E.P record that released this past February! We will release the "Wendy Baby" music video the night of the event. I am SOOO EXCITED!!! 

This campign was created to raise money for two facilities (The Next Door and the Nashville Rescue Missions) and give a special night out for the women (Ashley's Angels) who have been through many life challenging situations and are in need of the programs that both facilities offer to get them off the streets and back on their feet!

This event and evening is for them to enjoy a nice dinner and show while sharing their story that will inspire YOU!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $15,000 to make this event happen! That is just the cost to feed everyone and rent the building! All artists are donating there time to perform for these ladies! Trying to keep it basic!!
  • We have unique sponsorship packages below so you can get involved!
  • The funds will all go to Nashville Rescue Missions and The Next Door if we do not raise enough to put the event on, but I know we will!!!

The Impact

The Next Door is the facility that took in Wendy. Their main focus is helping women. I also wanted to help The Nashville Rescue Missions too!

Nashville Rescue Missions, not only helps the women but also the children and has a seperate facility for the men! I don't know about you but I am softy when it comes to the kids! I NEVER want to see a homeless child! 

  • When I told The Next Door about what I wanted to do they told me I could not have picked a better time to try and help! The building they are currently in was bought by a hotel since their location is right next to New Music City Center. They are desperately in need of funds to build their new facility and keep these women safe!!
Other Ways You Can Help

I know it is hard right now in our economy and if you can not donate monitarily please SPREAD THE WORD!! Maybe someone you share it with will be passionate and able to help and even become a sponsor!  

And that’s all there is to it!

story:
“I’ve been performing since before I could talk. It's not like I really remember, right? After all how many 2 year olds could? But you know how I know? My parents filmed & photographed my many “musical performances” - so this is all well documented. It’s pretty funny stuff me in diapers acting like I’m singing. Back then, it was markers and crayons that sufficed for microphones, and only mom and dad were in the audience listening, laughing, and secretly hoping I would become a lawyer or get an MBA instead of getting into the music business like they did. Those weren’t in the cards for me either, but art school was!

I came to Memphis in 2009 to attend the Memphis College of Art on a really great scholarship. With help from my parents, I was able to graduate debt free. Now they fully support my choice to pursue a career in music. I got lucky again.                   

I started performing here in Memphis while in college. After graduation things really started to get busy. At the start of this year I was with dad at the Nokia Theatre in the Staples Center, watching him accept his second GRAMMY for an album on which I was featured. Over the years I've performed for and met many of you, at festivals, on cruise ships, at private events and at my regular performances in Memphis.  

The number one question the band and I get after a performance is:

"When can I buy your music?" 

Finally, the answer is NOW, almost. Me and the band are just inches away from being able to release our first collection of music to you. But there's still a little further to go until we reach this goal. The Bronze Age is the title of the 5 song EP we are ready to get in your hands! Track list as follows:

  • Put That Bronze
  • Branch Strewn Sky
  • My Heart's On Fire
  • We Rewind
  • Ethel

We’ve already recorded and mixed, and it’s off to get mastered now. We’ve all got skin in the game. We wrote the original material, rehearsed and funded this portion ourselves with earnings from performances. We recorded and mixed at Scott Bomar’s Electraphonic Recording studio. Scott's credits include Hustle & Flow, Cyndi Lauper, Black Snake Moan, etc. I'll be putting my BFA to work by contributing some of my original artwork to the CD packaging, website, and other merch. We’re working with the super talented Lauren Rae Holterman to make us look good! It's really important that our printed pieces be the same high quality as our recordings. As you can imagine all of these hard expenses really add up. 

Your generous support helps us with the cost of:

  • printing/duplicating physical copies with environmentally friendly packaging                   
  • constructing our brand new website, domain, hosting                                                              
  • creating a professional quality music video 
  • creating quality artwork for website, CD packaging, T-shirts, posters                                   
  • production of merch (t-shirts, stickers, posters)                                                                            
  • properly compensating The Lovers for their extraordinary studio skills

Every one of your contributions will help us to do all of this independently and we wish to thank you in advance for your generosity, love and support! This independence allows us to connect directly to you, our friends, family and supporters. It’s just you, us, and the music. We can't wait to share this with you!

I’d also like to give a special thanks to our treasured friend, the incomparable Karen Carrier, who owns both of the amazing establishments where we frequently perform, Mollie Fontaine Lounge and Bar DKDC. I have a weekly solo piano gig @ Mollie Fontaine Lounge every Thursday night. Me & the Lovers also perform regularly @ Bar DKDC in Cooper-Young. Thanks to Karen for these rare opportunities to connect with so many incredible people who support us in this legendary music city of Memphis!

I also feel extremely grateful for the support from the Memphis art and music community: ArtsMemphis, Lauren Boyer, BalletMemphis, Crosstown Arts; The Recording Academy; The Memphis Symphony Orchestra; Memphis music writers Michael Donahue, Mark Jordan, Chris Herrington, Kerry Crawford, Joe Boone, Chris Shaw, Mark Richens, Chris Davis, and Bob Mehr. 

Smiles from ear to ear, and we'll see you soon,

Marcella and Her Lovers (who were a part of the making of The Bronze Age):

-Marcella, lead vocals;

-Dave Cousar, guitar

-Dirk Kitterlin, bass

-Jonathan Schallert, keyboard

-Terrance Simien, accordion 

- Rory Mills Sullivan, drums 

-Chris Owen, guitar  

Guest horn players:  

Randy Ballard, flugelhorn, trumpet

Nathan Duvall, trombone  

Victor Sawyer, trombone

_____________________________________________________________________

Here's a little something The Memphis Flyer wrote this year:                                     

"Simien is in the core of Memphis tradition...combining different roots influences in idiosyncratic and unexpected ways...[She is] one of the most interesting artists to emerge on the Memphis scene in years.”                                    -Chris Herrington

Please join us at one of our upcoming performances in Memphis.                       Check our Facebook page or Twitter for a current schedule.

Oct 16, 23 (not Oct 30th): Mollie Fontaine Lounge, Marcella solo. 8:30PM-10:30PM.

Oct 17: Bar DKDC 11PM, $5 cover

Oct. 18: Lafayette's, The Marcella Simien Trio

Oct. 19: Catch us on ROCK 103 (102.7 FM, rock103.com, iheartradio.com), Catrina Guttery's show- Memphis Made this Sunday at 8pm talking about upcoming debut EP, and a couple tracks airing live for the first time ever! Sneak peak. You don't wanna miss it.

Oct. 21: Bar DKDC 9PM, w/Mama Rosin from Switzerland, $5 cover

Oct. 25: TBA

Oct. 26: River Arts Fest. 2:30PM

Oct 30: Indie Memphis Music Showcase & After-Party

Oct 31: Bar DKDC, 10PM, $5

Oct 31: Special Gris Gris performance, w/ Sheiks, Super Witch and Devil Train TBA

Nov. 1: Rock & Romp 2 Overton Park. 4:00PM $5 suggested donation.

Nov. 1: Marcella guesting with The Maitre-D’s, TBA

Nov. 6, 13, 20, 26: Mollie Fontaine Lounge, Marcella solo. 8:30PM-10:30PM.

Nov. 7: Bar DKDC. 11PM, $5

Nov. 8: Booksellers at Laurelwood in the Bistro, Marcella solo

Nov. 14: Private event for Rhodes College

Nov. 15: Bar DKDC 11PM, $5

Nov. 26: Mollie Fontaine Lounge, 8:30pm Special pre-Thanksgiving show w/ special guests and family

Dec. 4, 11, 18 (maybe the 24th TBA): Mollie Fontaine Lounge, Marcella solo. 8:30PM-10:30PM.

Dec. 5 & 26: Bar DKDC. 11PM, $5

story:
Summary

  • I am a Disabled Marine Corps Veteran that became a Commercial and Film set photographer upon my return home but a humbling life experience has led me to live in the world of Photojournalism and Documentary work.
  • My campaign is one of art, culture and life in the city of New Orleans. In all aspects of life we must give back to the places and people who made us who we are. In essence, I owe a lot to the beautiful people and the amazing city of New Orleans. I've submitted my work for the last three years to be considered and didn't get selected but this time I've finally hit the mark!
  • My job is to capture and document the live performances by major international (eg, Eric Clapton & Carlos Santana) and local artists (Honey Island Swamp Band & The Treme' Brass Band) on and off stage as well as the life, culture, art and the patrons enjoying the festivities.


What I Need & What You Get

  • What I need is travel funding (Rental Car, Gas & Food from Atlanta to New Orleans and back (I've already secured lodging for the week that I will be there). In addition, I'll need two extra camera batteries, an extra battery charger and and four extra 8GB CF Memory cards. I've had everything properly planned yet an unforeseen family emergency has caused me to use the funds that I've saved. Although this would be one of, if not the biggest project in my career, above all else, family is most important. 
  • Here is the breakdown for expenses Rental Car - $350.00 (Standard size for a week), Fuel for the vehicle (Round trip is 982.2miles) along with fuel within the city (Roughly 55 gallons for a vehicle that uses 23-25 mpg @ $3.51 per = $193.05) Camera Batteries (2 @ $69.99 each) Battery Charger ( 1 @ $45.99), 8 GB Compact Flash memory cards (4 @ 29.99 each) and Meals for the week (a rate of $40.00 per day for seven days = $280.00). Note: All funds that are contributed will go into my business account and not anyone's personal account. 
  • What I do offer in return are perks which include prints from my website, which will be signed and mailed securely to those who contribute. Please view the perks listed for a more detailed description. In addition to being signed, framed images will be numbered. 

The Impact

We all know that music is the soundtrack to our lives and each time we hear a song, it takes us back to a memorable time where we can remember what we were doing at the exact moment when we hear a particular song. Music is art and art is life and I want to tell that story frame by frame.... 

To all those who contribute, please know that I am dedicated to preserving Art, Culture and Life through my gift of photography and nothing I do in the photojournalism or documentary realm is for profit. I only aim to give back and help others as we all should.  As far as some of my Photojournalism or Documentary work is concerned, I've done several projects involving Homelessness and Childhood Cancer (which is a subject that hits extremely close to home). Some of the images can be viewed on my website at www.ianfrankgallery.com


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people are not in a position to contribute, but please know that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools and other social media sites such as Facebook and Twitter.
story_txt:
Summary
I am a Disabled Marine Corps Veteran that became a Commercial and Film set photographer upon my return home but a humbling life experience has led me to live in the world of Photojournalism and Documentary work.
My campaign is one of art, culture and life in the city of New Orleans. In all aspects of life we must give back to the places and people who made us who we are. In essence, I owe a lot to the beautiful people and the amazing city of New Orleans. I've submitted my work for the last three years to be considered and didn't get selected but this time I've finally hit the mark!
My job is to capture and document the live performances by major international (eg, Eric Clapton & Carlos Santana) and local artists (Honey Island Swamp Band & The Treme' Brass Band) on and off stage as well as the life, culture, art and the patrons enjoying the festivities.
What I Need & What You Get
What I need is travel funding (Rental Car, Gas & Food from Atlanta to New Orleans and back (I've already secured lodging for the week that I will be there). In addition, I'll need two extra camera batteries, an extra battery charger and and four extra 8GB CF Memory cards. I've had everything properly planned yet an unforeseen family emergency has caused me to use the funds that I've saved. Although this would be one of, if not the biggest project in my career, above all else, family is most important. 
Here is the breakdown for expenses Rental Car - $350.00 (Standard size for a week), Fuel for the vehicle (Round trip is 982.2miles) along with fuel within the city (Roughly 55 gallons for a vehicle that uses 23-25 mpg @ $3.51 per = $193.05) Camera Batteries (2 @ $69.99 each) Battery Charger ( 1 @ $45.99), 8 GB Compact Flash memory cards (4 @ 29.99 each) and Meals for the week (a rate of $40.00 per day for seven days = $280.00). Note: All funds that are contributed will go into my business account and not anyone's personal account. 
What I do offer in return are perks which include prints from my website, which will be signed and mailed securely to those who contribute. Please view the perks listed for a more detailed description. In addition to being signed, framed images will be numbered. 

The ImpactWe all know that music is the soundtrack to our lives and each time we hear a song, it takes us back to a memorable time where we can remember what we were doing at the exact moment when we hear a particular song. Music is art and art is life and I want to tell that story frame by frame.... To all those who contribute, please know that I am dedicated to preserving Art, Culture and Life through my gift of photography and nothing I do in the photojournalism or documentary realm is for profit. I only aim to give back and help others as we all should.  As far as some of my Photojournalism or Documentary work is concerned, I've done several projects involving Homelessness and Childhood Cancer (which is a subject that hits extremely close to home). Some of the images can be viewed on my website at www.ianfrankgallery.comOther Ways You Can HelpI understand that some people are not in a position to contribute, but please know that doesn’t mean you can’t help:Please to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools and other social media sites such as Facebook and Twitter.

story:
Hi!  My name is Norwood...

I'm a Pop Singer from the ATL, and I want to create the official music video for my original song "Gravity"!  It's going to be a powerful, "gravity defying" video that will bring some BIG surprises that have NEVER been done in a music video before...nope, sorry, I can't tell you about those just yet :) Trust me, they are worth the wait!   NOTE:  Keep reading to find out how this campaign will help our charity of choice "Lost-N-Found Youth"!  

The wheels are already in motion...

  • We've got the song (Take a listen to it here: www.Norwood-Music.com/Hear)
  • We've got a GREAT concept with a powerful message and some AMAZING surprises that have NEVER been done in a music video before -  I can't wait for you to see :)
  • The cast, crew, and videographer are all ready to go!
  • All we need now, is for YOU to join us in this project!

Here's What We Need...

We are shooting for a fundraising goal of $4,000.  A good music video doesn't come cheap, but we've done our best to budget smart and get the most bang for your buck ;)  The money is going to help us pay for:

  • The videographer
  • The actors, band, and dancers
  • The venue
  • Wardrobe, hair, and makeup
  • Marketing & distribution for the video
  • and other misc. expenses (like travel costs, equipment rentals, etc.)

What happens if we exceed the $4,000 goal?!?

 Team Norwood is very excited to announce that we've partnered with "Lost-N-Found Youth" to help get the 750+ homeless teens off the streets of Atlanta!!  We will give this wonderful charity ALL funds raised above our goal.  We will also use this video and have a concert and other opportunities in the works to raise awareness and funds to help them build a much needed shelter in the Atlanta area!  They already have a building but it's needs A LOT of renovations to make it a safe and nurturing home that will house and offer resource services for homeless teens. (see photo below)  Check them out at www.lostnfoundyouth.org


Here's What YOU Get!

So you're probably wondering..."what do I get out of this?"  Well my friend, YOU get the warm satisfaction of knowing you've given me a bigger voice to help some awesome charities such as "Lost-N-Found Youth" :)  OH, and all these AMAZING perks:

  • Starring in the video!
  • Spending a day with me at Six Flags Over GA!
  • A private concert
  • Exclusive behind-the-scenes content
  • Limited edition merchandise
  • Digital downloads
  • ...and more!  We will even plant a tree in your honor if you want :)
Check out ALL of our perks over here ------->

The Impact

So, why is this video so important to me?  I was put on this earth to make a difference in the world through music, and I am confident this video will be the catalyst to help me make that happen.

There are several causes that are very close to my heart - homelessness among LGBT youth (as well as homelessness in general), bullying, the de-stigmatization of mental illness, animal welfare, and environmental protection, to name a few.  This video will become a platform on which I can stand with a bigger voice to bring awareness and positive change to these issues.

I believe that music and art have the power to change the world for the better.  
One person can dream, but together we can fly.


    "I'm broke!  How else can I help?!"

    Just because you can't help financially right now doesn't mean you can't help us in a BIG way!

    • Getting the word out and making some noise about the campaign on Social Media is a HUGE help!  Spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and whatever else the kids are on these days ;)  The easiest way to do that is through the Share tools right underneath the pitch video!
    • Share the campaign with your family and friends too - be sure to show them the pitch video and the AWESOME perks they will get by contributing!
    • Just sharing my music with the people in your life can make a great impact too - the more people hear it, the better!
    • And follow me on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram - the more followers I have, the bigger the impact (I'll follow you back)!

    Please spread the word, and check back here often - we'll be releasing limited edition perks throughout the campaign that you won't want to miss!

    Lastly, I want to thank everyone who is contributing to this campaign (in whatever way - big or small, financial or otherwise) from the bottom of my heart.  You are truly amazing, and I thank you SO much for believing in me and my dream :)

    P.S.  By the way, here are the lyrics for some inspiration!

    Pump the Music!
    - Norwood

Please spread the word, and check back here often - we'll be releasing limited edition perks throughout the campaign that you won't want to miss!

story:
(N)ception has been working on their debut album for the majority of 2014 and we are ready to release it to the world! The album "Letters of (N)tent" contains 16 songs and runs a full 110 minutes. Recorded and Engineered by the Grammy nominated producer Chris Short in Alpaca Ranch Recording in Orlando, Florida. The album is fully recorded and being mastered as we speak.

We are looking for your help to press the first 1,000 copies of the album and get a touring vehicle so we can tour behind the album as well. Your contribution will help us attain these goals and get (N)ception on track to where they need to be!

We are offering many incentives for this campaign so check them and support (N)ception.

We love you all!

-Nikk, Chamo, Flake, and Fish

story:
--> [日本語は下にあります]

About this Campaign

Hi!

My name is Minami. I've been singing Jazz, Latin and Bossa Nova professionally in Japan and Berlin for many years and it has always been a dream of mine to make my own album. I want to produce my first album in the spring of 2015 with the best musicians and the best recording studio in Berlin, the city I have called home for over 3 years now. It's really important for me to make the best album I can because I want to donate a portion of the proceeds from sale of the album to animal rights groups in Japan.

With your help, you can be part of getting my music out to the world, which in turn will allow me to do my small but important part to help improve the situation for animals in Japan.



What I Need ... What You Get

In order to make this album happen, with the help of my contributors I need to raise US$7000. The budget covers:

  • Studio fees (2 days of recording, plus mastering and mixing)
  • Musicians' fees (2 days of studio recording)
  • CD production (layout, design, pressing, etc)
  • Buying licensing and rights from GEMA
  • Taxes, transfer fees, etc.
In exchange for your contribution, no matter how big or small, you will not only receive my heartfelt thanks, but also something special and personal from me to show you how grateful I am that you are with me on this exciting project.
This campaign is ALL or NOTHING. I absolutely cannot make this album without your help, so if we don't reach the goal then the album doesn't get made and I don't receive any of the donations pledged (ie, you get your money back, your credit card won't be billed). So let's do this and go all the way!
(If we surpass our goal, then the money can go towards making the album EVEN BETTER - with more photos, more songs with even more excellent guest musicians, and if possible even a massive release party in one of Berlin's top jazz clubs!)
The album will be recorded at UFO Sound Studio in Berlin and will feature the best jazz musicians in the city:


UFO Sound Studio in Berlin



Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not in a position to contribute any money to fund this album, you can still help this dream album become a reality.

Please help spread the word by sharing this campaign via Facebook, Twitter, email, or even through word of mouth to anyone you know who might be interested in becoming part of this exciting project which has been a dream of mine for many years.

Thank you!
xoxo
Minami

___________________

私のデビューアルバム制作のための支援者を募集します！！

このキャンペーンについて

ドイツ・ベルリンのレコーディングスタジオで一流ミュージシャンたちと自分のデビューアルバムを制作したい！21歳の頃からジャズを歌い始めクラブやホテルでずっと歌って来ました。いつかCDを作りたいと思ってはいたものの多額の費用の問題でスポンサーのいない自分には無理なんだとあきらめていました。ドイツに拠点を移し音楽を続けているうちにさらなる目標を達成したいと思うようになりました。アルバムが作れたらレコード会社や音楽活動での有利なプロモーションができる。これから多くの人に自分を知ってもらうためにも今回のプロジェクトを成功させ皆さんに私のアルバムをお届けしたい！

音楽とその先のゴール

芸術家としての私の使命は自分のためだけの音楽ではなく、あらゆるところで「心の平和」を訴えゆく存在になることです。様々な社会問題がある中で特に日本の ペット殺処分問題に大変心を痛めています。命を軽視する社会であってはいけない。自分の音楽や動物愛護活動を通して「命の尊さ」を人々に訴えてゆきたい。 芸術は自分を映し出す鏡です。平和な社会を望む自分にできる事は何か、その目的があるから音楽がさらに価値あるものになると思っています。

自分の愛する音楽が動物たちの命を救う事に繋がればこれほど嬉しい事はありません。そのためのお手伝いができるように今後の全てのCDの売り上げの15% を日本の動物愛護団体に寄付する事。そして日本のペットが置かれている現状を海外の人も含めより多くの人たちに伝えて行く事がもう一つの私の目的でもあり ます。

アルバムを作り今 回のプロジェクトを成功させる事が出来たら、私が愛する創造的な芸術と共に私の存在意義を感じることができます。尊い命の保護に貢献できる事は、私にとっ てとても幸せなことです。皆さんと共に願う「命を尊ぶ社会の実現」に私がお役に立てるよう、ご支援いただけたら嬉しいです。

私たちに必要なこと

アルバムを作る為のCD制作には実際にたくさんの費用がかかります。

  • スタジオ代 (レコーディング2日間＋マスタリング、ミキシング)
  • ミュージシャン出演料(2日間)
  • CD 製造 (プレス, レイアウト, デザイン, etc)
  • 著作権, 権利
  • 税金, 送料, etc　
  • 合計　7,000ドルの金額を調達しなければなりません

＊アルバムのレコーディングは来年の春までに済ませ晩春には完成させる予定です

こ のクラウドファンディングキャンペーンの目的は支援してくださる人たちと一緒にこのプロジェクトを成功させる事です。しかしながら期限内(40日間)に目 標金額に到達しなかった場合、プロジェクトは不成立となり資金調達は実施されません。その場合は支援者からの寄付金はリターンされ私からの特典を提供する 事はできません。期限までに支援総額が目標金額に到達した場合のみ、このプロジェクトはサクセスとなり資金調達が実施されアルバム制作が実現します。期間 内に目標金額以上の資金が集まった場合はアルバムのクオリティーをさらに上げる事ができます（アルバム曲のアレンジ代、CDジャケットカバーの撮影代に当 てます）

皆さんのサポートなしではこのキャンペーンを成功させる事は出来ません！

私がさせて頂くあなたへの特典

寄付をして頂いた方には私の考えた特典が提供されます。アルバム曲はもちろんの事、特典には私の様々なスキルを生かしたお返しをさせて頂きます 出張生ライブや一番ホットなマイルスデイビスをGETした方はこのアルバムのプロデューサーとしてCDにお名前が掲載されます。さらに貴方の大好きなジャズ ナンバーを私が歌って録音いたします（レコーディング終了後デジタルでお届け）などなど、少しエキサイティングな経験が味わえる内容になっていますのでそ の時が来るまでのお楽しみに！日本人の方は日本語で書かれた特典をご覧ください。内容によっては日程の打ち合わせなどもありますのでまた後日話し合いま す。＊大阪市外への出張ライブは交通費ご負担願います

寄付出来ない方でも他の支援方法があります

カンパが出来ない人でも、このキャンペーンを広める事ができます！もしかしてあなたのお友達や家族がサポーターになってくれる可能性もあります！このキャ ンペーンをいろんな人に伝えてください！Facebook, Twitter などのシェアー大歓迎です！！Danke! ありがとう！

xoxo
Minami


寄付方法はピンク色のCONTRIBUTE NOWと書かれてあるボタンをクリックしてから進みます。PayPalを通してのクレジットカードでのお支払いとなります。

***寄付への手順がこちらで詳しくご覧いただけます***


クレジットカードをお持ちでない方・又はご質問のある方はこちらへご連絡ください　minami.indiegogocampaign@gmail.com

のクラウドファンディングキャンペーンの目的は支援してくださる人たちと一緒にこのプロジェクトを成功させる事です。しかしながら期限内(40日間)に目
標金額に到達しなかった場合、プロジェクトは不成立となり資金調達は実施されません。その場合は支援者からの寄付金はリターンされ私からの特典を提供する
事はできません。期限までに支援総額が目標金額に到達した場合のみ、このプロジェクトはサクセスとなり資金調達が実施されアルバム制作が実現します。期間
内に目標金額以上の資金が集まった場合はアルバムのクオリティーをさらに上げる事ができます（アルバム曲のアレンジ代、CDジャケットカバーの撮影代に当
てます）
皆さんのサポートなしではこのキャンペーンを成功させる事は出来ません！



私がさせて頂くあなたへの特典


寄付をして頂いた方には私の考えた特典が提供されます。アルバム曲はもちろんの事、特典には私の様々なスキルを生かしたお返しをさせて頂きます

出張生ライブや一番ホットなマイルスデイビスをGETした方はこのアルバムのプロデューサーとしてCDにお名前が掲載されます。さらに貴方の大好きなジャズ
ナンバーを私が歌って録音いたします（レコーディング終了後デジタルでお届け）などなど、少しエキサイティングな経験が味わえる内容になっていますのでそ
の時が来るまでのお楽しみに！日本人の方は日本語で書かれた特典をご覧ください。内容によっては日程の打ち合わせなどもありますのでまた後日話し合いま
す。＊大阪市外への出張ライブは交通費ご負担願います
寄付出来ない方でも他の支援方法があります


カンパが出来ない人でも、このキャンペーンを広める事ができます！もしかしてあなたのお友達や家族がサポーターになってくれる可能性もあります！このキャ
ンペーンをいろんな人に伝えてください！Facebook, Twitter などのシェアー大歓迎です！！Danke! 
ありがとう！

xoxoMinami
寄付方法はピンク色のCONTRIBUTE NOWと書かれてあるボタンをクリックしてから進みます。PayPalを通してのクレジットカードでのお支払いとなります。


***寄付への手順がこちらで詳しくご覧いただけます***


クレジットカードをお持ちでない方・又はご質問のある方はこちらへご連絡ください　minami.indiegogocampaign@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

Queen Ave Art Collective is a DIT (Do It Together) art space in East Nashville, Tennessee. We have hosted multiple amazing national and local artist and hope to host many more. While we have a great PA system and an awesome group of volunteers,  the one thing we do need is to work on the acoustics. With concrete walls, floors, and ceiling, our space sounds very much like a high school gymnasium. With your help we want to invest in some professional sound dampening treatment.

What We Need & What You Get

We need around $800 to purchase and install Professional Sound Dampening Treatment. We want your local art & music space to sound the best we can offer.

Perks include high fives, bear hugs, free admission to shows, and even a party thrown in your name!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We know that not all people just can't contribute a monetary donation , but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share our IndieGoGo page on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, or other social media outlets. Help us get the word out!

story:
WINTERSUN FOREST PACKAGE PRE-ORDER EXTENDED!!! AVAILABLE UNTIL APRIL 30th!

Due to the popular demand and a lot of requests we have decided to still offer our FOREST PACKAGE via Indiegogo’s InDemand option through April! This way those who didn’t have the chance to buy the FOREST PACKAGE during the original campaign in March or missed the deadline can still get it until April 30th.

Nuclear Blast’s pre-sale for our new album 'The Forest Seasons' physical versions (CD & vinyl) will start after our inDemand month, in the beginning of May. The FOREST PACKAGE & FOREST PACKAGE EXPANSION with all the killer extra content will not be available in May anymore.

- Jari, Teemu, Jukka, Kai

 

*** Mega surprise update below: FOREST PACKAGE EXPANSION / STRETCH GOAL! WATCH THE NEW VIDEO and scroll down to check out all the new items you will get FOR FREE!!! ***

Wintersun's NEW ALBUM is here!

 

Hooray! Our 3rd full length album The Forest Seasons is now available! You can order the new album included in our massive FOREST PACKAGE now from this campaign and you will be supporting us, the band! Your support means the world to us! Buying the FOREST PACKAGE directly from us you will get the true highest quality experience to enjoy our new album and you will also help us to build the Wintersun Headquarters studio & rehearsal place, enabling us to finish TIME II and start recording our future albums with our true vision and release them faster to YOU!

Thank you guys!!!

- Jari, Jukka, Kai, Teemu

 

Here's what the FOREST PACKAGE includes:

 

WINTERSUN - THE FOREST SEASONS *NEW ALBUM*

  • The 3rd NEW full length album from Wintersun
  • High quality MASTER FILES download for the ultimate listening experience WAV 24-bit 44,1kHz
  • Includes also high quality 320kbps MP3s for mobile devices with embedded artwork and lyrics
  • Unique album influenced by the magic of nature's season changes with one song representing each season
  • 4 monumental songs, 54 minutes of epic metal!
  • Distinctive Wintersun sound with lots of new elements
  • 100% ass kicking guarantee!!!

Tracklist:

1. Awaken From The Dark Slumber (Spring) 14:41

Part I The Dark Slumber

Part II The Awakening

2. The Forest That Weeps (Summer) 12:18

3. Eternal Darkness (Autumn) 14:08

Part I Haunting Darkness

Part II The Call of the Dark Dream

Part III Beyond the Infinite Universe

Part IV Death

4. Loneliness (Winter) 12:54

Total running time: 54:01

 

THE FOREST SEASONS 5K BOOKLET

  • AMAZING 17-page 5K booklet crafted by Jari himself
  • Resolution 5120 x 2880
  • Wide format, 16:9 aspect ratio, looks stunning on full screen! (Works and looks great also on lower resolution screens)
  • Enjoy all the lyrics and band member photos representing each season with incredible sharpness and vivid colors while listening the new album! The true experience to enjoy this album!
  • Album cover by Gyula Havancsák and Jari Mäenpää

WINTERSUN - THE FOREST SEASONS INSTRUMENTAL

  • Enjoy the whole album's instrumental version without vocals
  • The "karaoke version"
  • Record your own vocals on top!

WINTERSUN - THE FOREST SEASONS ISOLATED TRACKS

  • Isolated tracks of ALL SONGS!
  • Hear all the details of a Wintersun album for the first time!
  • Discover and explore all the layers of different instruments
  • Learn how Jari composes and builds the Wintersun songs
  • Isolated tracks include: drums, bass, rhythm guitars, solo & melody guitars, orchestrations & synths and vocals
  • Make your own special mixes and play along!

WINTERSUN - TIME I 1.5 REMASTER

  • The absolute BEST version of Wintersun's epic album TIME I
  • High quality MASTER FILES download WAV 24-bit 44,1kHz
  • Includes also high quality 320kbps MP3s for your mobile devices with embedded artwork and lyrics
  • Each track is separate, so the album is not continuous like the original (except Darkness and Frost & Time are together as one track)
  • Remastered by Jari Mäenpää

Mastering refinements from the original album:

  • Drums & rhythm guitars slightly louder with little EQ polish
  • Bass tighter and deeper
  • Some upper mid frequencies' harshness refined from the overall master
  • Better, snappier, punchier master bus compression
  • Overall loudness about the same as Metallica's "Black Album"
  • Other additional magical tweaks for orchestrations and vocals

WINTERSUN 2.0 REMASTER

  • The absolute BEST version of Wintersun's historic debut album!
  • High quality MASTER FILES download WAV 24-bit 44,1kHz
  • Includes also high quality 320kbps MP3s for your mobile devices with embedded artwork and lyrics
  • Includes the original colossal Winter Madness Intro
  • New track order: Album starts with the Winter Madness Intro followed by Winter Madness and Beyond the Dark Sun. The way it was originally meant to be!
  • High quality enhanced digital album booklet
  • Remastered by Jari Mäenpää

Mastering refinements from the original album:

  • Bigger, clearer, punchier sound
  • Bass tighter and deeper
  • Treble frequencies more clear and pleasing to the ear, no “dirty frequencies”
  • Drums more audible and powerful
  • More dynamics, not too much limiting and compression, "anti loudness war version"

WINTERSUN LIVE AT TUSKA 2013

  • Spectacular show from Tuska Open Air Metal Festival 2013
  • Multitrack recorded directly from the mixing board, great sound!
  • High quality 320kbps MP3s with embedded artwork and lyrics
  • Amazing 30-page digital booklet
  • Mixed and mastered by Jari Mäenpää

Tracklist:

1. When Time Fades Away 4:10

2. Sons of Winter And Stars 13:22

3. Land of Snow and Sorrow 8:22

4. Winter Madness 5:27

5. Beautiful Death 7:24

6. Time 9:43

7. Starchild 10:18

Total running time: 58:46

 

WINTERSUN - LONELINESS (WINTER) ACOUSTIC

  • Beautiful acoustic version of The Forest Seasons album song Loneliness (Winter)
  • Killer instrumentation of different acoustic guitars, kantele and other additional samples
  • Entirely new arrangement
  • All clean vocals
  • Special FREE BONUS for all the Wintersun crowdfunders!

 

*** UPDATE: Special FREE BONUS for all the Wintersun crowdfunders ***

FOREST PACKAGE EXPANSION

 

WINTERSUN - TIME I 1.5 ISOLATED TRACKS

  • Listen all the instruments and vocals of TIME I 1.5 separately
  • Learn how TIME I was built and composed
  • Mix your own levels for the album
  • Make your own special mix of TIME I 1.5
  • Listen to the instruments with any combination, for example:
  • Vocals + Orchestration
  • Drums + Bass
  • Heavy metal mix (no orchestration)
  • (Does not include When Time Fades Away & Darkness and Frost)
  • These tracks will blow your mind!!!

WINTERSUN - TIME I 1.5 INSTRUMENTAL

  • Full instrumental version of TIME I 1.5
  • Nice listening experience without the vocals
  • Sing the song yourself
  • Record your own vocals on top
  • The "karaoke version"
  • (Does not include When Time Fades Away, because it's already in the full remaster TIME I 1.5)

WINTERSUN - LONELINESS (WINTER) ACOUSTIC INSTRUMENTAL

  • Nice listening experience without the vocals
  • Sing the song yourself
  • Record your own vocals on top
  • The "karaoke version"

WINTERSUN 5K WALLPAPER PACK

  • Ten killer Wintersun wallpapers with 5K high resolution (5120 x 2880)
  • Wide 16:9 crop that will fill your whole desktop nicely
  • Beautiful, vivid and incredibly sharp images

 

*** EVERYONE WHO ALREADY BOUGHT THE FOREST PACKAGE WILL GET THIS EXPANSION FOR FREE AUTOMATICALLY!    

*** EVERYONE WHO WILL BUY THE FOREST PACKAGE BEFORE OUR CAMPAIGN ENDS WILL GET THIS EXPANSION FOR FREE AUTOMATICALLY!

We have decided to do a STRETCH GOAL and try to reach half of our FINAL GOAL with this first campaign alone. If we can reach the STRETCH GOAL we could reach the FINAL GOAL possibly with just two campaigns, which means we could build the Wintersun Headquarters sooner and you would get our future albums faster! Help us by referring your friends, family & fellow metal and spread the word! Let's get to the STRETCH GOAL before time runs out!!!

7500 funders x 50 € = 375.000 € STRETCH GOAL!!!

 

 

The Plan

The plan is very simple. All you have to do is order our FOREST PACKAGE and enjoy all the great content including the highest quality version of our NEW album which you cannot get from anywhere else!

YOU WILL GET A DOWNLOAD LINK FOR THE FOREST PACKAGE from us via email the same day Nuclear Blast releases the physical version of 'The Forest Seasons' album. The album and all the content in the FOREST PACKAGE is 100% done. The release date is estimated for July 2017 due to Nuclear Blast's release schedule and Nuclear Blast will confirm the exact date later.

Please understand that we don't get much from the physical sales, so please consider buying directly from us with all the extra content. This will help us the most to deliver the future albums to you guys faster!

All the raised funds will be used to build the Wintersun Headquarters. This will enable us to finish TIME II without compromises with our true vision!

 

Budget for Wintersun Headquarters

We've consulted professional construction companies and studio builders and gotten the estimated budget:

  • The property 100.000 €
  • The building 250.000 €
  • Construction of the studio 150.000 €
  • Additional costs: Finnish taxes (& Indiegogo platform fee  5% + credit card fee 3%) 250.000 €
  • Total: 750.000 €

To raise all this funding we are planning to do three massive crowdfunding campaigns like this first one. Each one with a different massive 50 € package. We hope to reach 5000 loyal Wintersun fans per each campaign, which is the ideal goal. (The future campaigns will be planned and scheduled according to the result of this first campaign).

5000 funders x 50 € = 250.000 € IDEAL GOAL!!! (Reached in 9 days!)

But we are setting a safe goal to 3000 funders to secure the album release and get started even if we don't reach the ideal goal:

3000 funders x 50 € = 150.000 €

SAFE GOAL FOR ALBUM RELEASE!

(Reached in 20 hours!)

But we believe we can reach the ultimate FINAL GOAL already with this first campaign alone, if you guys support us by buying our FOREST PACKAGE and being active, motivating others by sharing all the crowdfunding updates on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. making this campaign go viral!

WE REALLY NEED YOUR HELP NOW MORE THAN EVER!

We need a "Wintersun army", an epic alliance to make this happen! Please spread the word!

15.000 funders x 50 € = 750.000 € FINAL GOAL!!!!!!

Reaching the final goal will enable us to build the Wintersun Headquarters immediately and deliver TIME II the fastest way with the best production and start recording our future Wintersun albums with our true vision for you guys!!!

Additionally, having our own Wintersun Headquarters studio & rehearsal place will help us to work more efficiently on other things like music videos, rehearsal videos, studio videos and video updates for you. Having our own place will also help us to improve our live production for bigger and better live shows, perhaps with a real orchestra someday and doing a live video recording of it which has also been a long time dream of ours! So let's make all these things happen guys! You have the power to help us!

THANK YOU!!!

This deal and the crowdfunding will last only this month, ending on March 31st 2017!

It will be over in a heartbeat! So act now and let's make some history together!

 

Follow our campaign updates and news on our social media channels:

www.facebook.com/wintersun

www.facebook.com/jariwintersun

www.facebook.com/teemuwintersun

www.facebook.com/jukkawintersun

www.facebook.com/kaihahto96

 

www.youtube.com/jariwintersun

 

www.twitter.com/wintersun

www.twitter.com/teemumantysaari
www.twitter.com/jukkiskoskinen

 

www.instagram.com/wintersunofficial

www.instagram.com/teemumantysaari

www.instagram.com/jariwintersun

www.instagram.com/jukkiskoskinen

story:
Help Us Record a New Album

We are excited to be heading into the studio to record our fourth full-length! We’ve been crafting our tunes over the past year and have studio time booked with Jesse Gander starting in May.

Our new material draws on our tradition of DIY ethics, critical anthems and pulling the punk rock community together. It’s the culmination of all the things we’ve learned, good or bad through the last 4 releases. It will also feature a guest appearance by local folk hero and our friend Jeff Andrew with his violin.

What we don’t have unfortunately, is the means to pay for it.

We are turning to our friends, fans and such. Will you help us out?

We are independent. We have no funding from labels or corporate sponsors (haha yeah right). We don’t make a profit here at Rebel Spell Incorporated; we do this because we love it. The songs we’ve been building have this new album poised to be our best work yet and with enough funding the icing on the whole thing will be the talent and experience of one of canada’s best punk engineer/producers.

Production Budget

Our rough budget for this production is as follows:

·  Pre-production: rehearsal time $700

·  Recording  $5000

·  Mixing $2000

·  Mastering $1000

·  Vinyl Pressing $3000

·  CD Pressing $2500

That should run us about $14,200 or so. We are hoping to raise $10,000 with this campaign, and cover the rest through a fundraiser tour and album sales after-the-fact. If the campaign falls short of this, you will still get your perk, no worries there. We still receive funding. Every little bit counts!

The Impact

We know you don't have to pay these days to get music and we are extremely grateful to those of you who have helped us over the years, for everything from buying a cd or download to giving us a patch of carpet to sleep on.

We have a list of perks that come with your donation. Want something from us that you don’t see? Send us a message and we’ll try to hook you up with whatever cool thing your heart desires.

Other Ways You Can Help

And if you can’t contribute and money right now, we understand. You could still give us a hand by posting this to your social media and letting people know.

Thank you!!

Photo by Jordana Meilleur

story:
Short Summary

  • We are a Christian Metal/Hardcore  band called The Dwelling. Since 2011 our goal has always been to share and encourage others through the love and message of Jesus Christ and we are blessed to do it through music we love.
  • Our new EP "Mechanics" is our second project as a band. It's about the struggles and obstacles that God works through to show us His glory, grace, and love. This album is our best work yet and is very important to us.
  • Due to life changes from school to new marriages in the band, finances have been harder to come by for this album. We need the support of our friends, fans, and family.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Goal - $3,000
  • $2,000 - Recording 
  • $800 - CD Duplication 
  • $200 - Album Graphics
  • We have AMAZING PERKS for any amount you donate! We also have added 10 special PERSONAL ITEMS from every band member which you will receive when you are the FIRST one to donate one of the listed dollar amounts. 

The Impact

  • Our passion is to make great music, connect with others, and bring Jesus into everything we do and to everywhere we go. We hope that this album will make an impact and encourage people to live life to the fullest and to not feel alone in their struggles.
  • We have been working on this EP for over a year. Check out our previous CD titled "Antidote" on iTunes.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • SHARE our campaign video on Facebook
  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
I've played music and sang for as long as I can remember. Growing up in a home surrounded by a family of musicians, it just made sense. I can't remember a family gathering where we didn't at some point pick up an instrument and begin singing and playing our favorite hymns or worship songs. Although I've been involved with music my whole life, I was never able to write songs. I was never motivated by stories of break ups, long lost lovers, and romance. It wasn't until I fully surrendered my life, including my talents and abilities, to Christ that I was filled with a song. 

Over the past year, I've been writing about what matters the most to me. I truly believe that within the Christian music genre we need more songs that are transparent and honest. Our music not only needs to be relatable on the good days, but the bad days as well. These songs were inspired by my community, and are about real struggles, faith, doubt, sin, and most importantly, they're about a passionate pursuit between creation and the Creator. This is why I've decided to call the title of my record, Chasing. We are all chasing something, but the good news is, God is personally inviting each of us to chase after Him. 

I will be recording this album with my very talented friend, Keith Harris. We will be recording in Nashville, Tennessee as well as St. Louis, Missouri, in late October with the hopes of releasing the record to the public in late November. 

THE CAMPAIGN 

You may be asking yourself, "Okay, but what does this have to do with me?" It has EVERYTHING to do with you! This record cannot happen without your help. To record an album, there are many expenses (all of which are included in the $6,000 goal) such as paying the engineer, mixing and producing fees, ordering physical copies of the CD, creating album artwork, paying musicians, and much more. I've chosen to do a "Flexible Campaign," which means that if I don't reach my goal, I will still receive all your donations. Not reaching my goal simply means that I will either be able to record less songs, or will have to wait until I save more money to record. Without the help of my community, I will not be able to make this record. It's up to YOU to help me make this dream a reality! 

To give to my campaign, all you need to do is hit the "Contribute Now" button and you will be guided through the giving process. But it doesn't end there! Based on the amount of support you give, you will also receive perks! There are all kinds of prizes for giving, including things like digital downloads, recording updates, hand written lyric sheets, posters, physical copies of the record, music lessons, acoustic concerts, and much more!

Remember that every single dollar counts, so whether you give $1 or $1,000, your gift is greatly appreciated! If you are unable to give financially, please partner with me in prayer. Pray that I would reach my goal and that I would be able to share these songs with the world. 

I want to thank all of you in advance for your prayers and donations. 

Let's chase Him together.

story:
The Old table Story


Hello my name is Will, for over ten years I have had this punk rock band / recording project called Old table. Because of cosmic good fortune I’ve been blessed with a supportive family and community of friends that have allowed me to play many, many shows, and make a generous number of self-released albums, mostly under the “Intellectual Bird Records” (or IBR) label. 


Starting in December of 2003 with hand dubbed cassette releases IBR mostly chronicled the recordings of Old table, peppered with a few other entries from other tri-state area friends (notably: No One and the Somebodies, Aeon Yahweh, the Commas are Tricky, and unauthorized bootlegs of my other band: TURBOSLEAZE) in May of 2013 every one of those 10 plus albums Old table had released were uploaded to oldtable.bandcamp.com and they are all available to stream / download for free to anyone who wants to hear them.

Musicianship of Utmost Quality



Old table started as a one man recording project and has taken various forms over the years both in live concerts and recordings. This Album features the talents of what has been the core rockin' live group for the last year featuring: my sister Becky Chair: Singer Extraordinaire, a rhythm section made up of two extremely talented multi-instrumentalists and songwriters in their own rights, Hollahan: Creative Bassman, and J Boxer: Drummer of Dreams. And Will Table: Songwriter, Guitarist, and your current Narrator.

"Excuse Maaay!"


At this point in the (anti-)career of the band, I feel it’s time to attempt to confront the world of “musical business”. To try to present a product and a package that is confident about it’s own existence and with what it’s image projects. This record wants to naively:

1. Save the environment.

2. Christen the youth of today with a holy anarchistic spirit of universal harmolodic justice.

3. Move me out of my parents house.

I’m laying it all out. These are my intentions. Let the chips fall as they may. Judge not lest ye be judged!


Making an Historic LP



  • One crucial player to this project I must mention at this point is engineer / producer / mixer / masterer of this record G.W. Duncanson of Gingerbird Studios.

G.W. (or as I affectionately refer to him, Geoff) has been a personal friend for just about as long as the band has existed and has always been supportive in a variety of ways, most noticeably by recording what is considered by many to be Old table's best record / easiest entry point for new listeners, a 5 song EP entitled Sexual Reproduction (available digitally for free). He's also worked on countless other quality recordings from a variety of artists including, Rat at Rat R, No One and the Somebodies, Genuine Imitations, Cave Cricket, Heads Up Display, and many many others not to mention his own bands, undiscovered giants of spazz rock Andrew Dice Clay Movie and the meditative Golden Bats.

Geoff has generously devoted so much of his time and energy to helping us make this album properly with care and attention, so I will be using a large chunk of the funds raised to pay him for his efforts.

  • The other funds will go to the production of the Vinyl records themselves, which when the cost of laquering, plates, test runs, jacket printing, label printing, packaging and shipping comes out to over $1,300.

Doing the Damn Thing... 



Through this fundraising project I humbly ask anyone who has ever downloaded / streamed any Old table albums for free and enjoyed it, saw a show and was entertained by it, or any newcomers who would like to help make this record a physical reality, to donate whatever they feel is appropriate, we’re offering some gifts that we think fans of the band will enjoy very much!


If...

If the project is not fully funded, everyone will still receive all of their perks. The only difference being that the final version of Old table's "Save the Environment" will be a CD instead of a record.

Thank You.

Thanks for reading this far, and for considering a contribution. If you don't feel that you can contribute funds right now but still want to help out, please share a link to this project with any rock n roll fans you know!!!  I hope you enjoy the preview song! Toodalooo!

story:
Hi! We're Blackwood Legacy. We were founded 14 years ago by Gospel Music Hall of Fame inductee and long time Blackwood Brothers member, Rick Price. Performing some 240 times a year, the quartet currently thrives as a living tribute to the original Blackwood Brothers while remaining focused on the contemporary edge of Southern Gospel music. Rick has assembled a vocal supergroup that tours with him full time. Luke Yates, Paul Secord, and Hunter Sparkman help insure the tradition of Gospel music is upheld with tight harmonies, soaring melodies, and inspiring vocal arrangements. Yet the energy and antics of this fun loving crew cross over all generational lines, drawing audiences into engaging, emotional, and side splitting performances. 

We're on a mission. One of our members, Paul Secord, has written an amazing song entitled "I'll Stand".  It honors our nation's defenders and heroes...our Veterans. "I'll Stand" is being met with standing ovations all across the country and we're set on giving it the treatment it deserves with the help of our friend, Craig Sexton. Craig is a veteran Hollywood director with credits like Michael Jackson's Victory Tour, NBC's Must See TV campaign, and The Wonder Years. He was even head of Lucasfilm's LA division and operated LA's first music video studio! We can only call it divine intervention that our paths crossed...and that he was inspired by our song. Immediately he offered to help us capture what we do on film, in a way that only he can. That's right. The director that filmed Michael Jackson, Van Halen, and Stevie Wonder wants to film Blackwood Legacy. To call it an amazing opportunity would be an understatement.

Blackwood Legacy has never released a DVD, much less one with this much potential. The impact of this project will be dynamic and far reaching. We can bring much needed attention to our vets and help America recognize the honor that our defenders of freedom deserve, all the while growing the audience for our style of vocally driven Gospel music. "I'll Stand" will anchor a full concert lineup of both traditional and original favorites that you will know and love. The DVD will also include interviews and behind the scenes footage of the event. Our audiences have asked for something like this for years, but the pieces have never come together like they are right now. For God and country, it's time to take a Stand and we need you to be a part of it.

The estimated final cost of the completed "I'll Stand" Concert DVD project is $22, 450. That  breaks down into $12k for pro HD camera rigs and gear leasing, $10k for all personnel involved including camera ops, engineer, editor, director, and a couple techs, and $450 for an insurance rider to cover the event. The venue is provided nearly free of cost and we also have a team of volunteers contributing to the effort on concert night. The final product of this kind of setup will stand the test of time and continue to be relevant and look great many years down the road. We've called in a bevy of favors to reduce production cost and have managed to cut it nearly in half from the original $40K!

In return for your generous contributions we offer some exciting gifts, from first run and autographed CDs/DVDs to personal video messages with Blackwood Legacy singing your favorite song, Dinner with the quartet, and even Executive Producer credit right on the DVD cover!!!

If we're not able to raise the total $22,450, we will carry on with the project in ernest, while shrinking the scale to match our budget. Rick, our group leader, is so committed he offered to drain his humble retirement account to make this thing go! He admits, however, that in this economy his 401k looks more like a 911. Even so, every single penny raised here will go directly to the project. Period.

There is sooooo much to be done. We are already working hard to make this "I'll Stand" Concert DVD a reality. We have the faith AND the fans to make it happen. Please stand with us as we launch this crowd funding campaign. If you can't contribute dollars, you can certainly contribute shares and make use of all of Indiegogo's sharing tools. Lastly, keep our group and this project in your prayers. We all truly need it. 

There you have it. Dollars, Shares, & Prayers. Pick one or try all three!!! And we thank you in advance for your support. See you at the finish line...

Blackwood Legacy

www.blackwoodlegacy.com
