story:
Hello Music Patrons,

Thank you for visiting this project. I have the opportunity to record my piece Adirondack Tableau on the PARMA Record Label. Scored for Violin, Cello, and Piano, this piece is a set of three musical reflections based on locations in the Adirondack Park: Raquette Lake, the Marion River, and Browns Tract. The CD will be called Modern Piano Trios and is a compilation which will feature fellow composers as well as internationally known cellist, Ovidiu Marinescu.

With your help I am trying to raise $3000.00 for this project. The funds will help cover the cost of the recording session in Philadelphia, PA. as well as world-wide distribution of the CD by the PARMA Record Label. Anticipated release for the CD is May of 2015.

This will be my second project with PARMA and Mr. Marinescu.  PARMA is well respected in the industry and works tirelessly on behalf of their artists. Their genuine pursuit for the best recording possible is why I would greatly appreciate the chance to work with them again. My first release with PARMA was a great success, the CD was well promoted and well received. The project culminated with a CD release concert at Weill Hall in New York City. PARMA chose this wonderful venue because of their desire to have their artists recognized.  My hope is that this next project will build on the success of the first CD and will continue to expose a wider audience to my music.

In the event that you are unable to contribute at this time I ask for your help by letting more people know about this project. I appreciate any way that you can help. I thank you for your consideration.
Sincerely,
Nicholas Ascioti

story:
Hello friends, family, and fans!

I just want to say thank you.  Thank you for your generous support for all these years.  Through the shows, the albums, the writing sessions, and supporting the bands I’ve been playing with; it has been both a challenging and amazing journey, during some of the toughest times in the history of the music business.

At times I have wanted to just quit, so tired of all the lies and dishonesty the music industry can throw at you.  But it is what I love and you are the reason I continue to do it.  Some time ago, with your support of my pledge campaign, I was able to raise the funds needed to record my best work to date.  An amazing young producer named Brian Craddock (Daughtry) helped me regain my self confidence as a musician and a writer.  “Cross the Line” was the first track I wrote with him on the first day back to work, and we both looked at each other like we had discovered the Holy Grail.  I was back and finally with a producer I could trust.

Your support and faith in me was what kept me going; it kept me from calling it a day and hanging up my guitar forever.  The positive outreach from everyone, from phone calls to texts and emails, kept me going.  Through the last campaign, I can say I met some lifelong friends and amazing people that will forever be with me.  You’re all stuck with me.

As a new season is about to begin, I’ve learned that crowd funding and asking people for help is okay, and that without your support I might never fully realize my dreams.  You have replaced the record labels.  Crowd funding is one of the coolest, most personal ways that a person can become a part of a team, be a partner in dream building, and the most amazing way of getting to know someone while simultaneously making “our” music available globally.

The goal is to raise $35,000.  How will this money be spent?  A portion will be used to hire A&R Worldwide, a proven and trusted organization that has worked extensively with one of my main and most trusted advisors.  They are the very successful independent A&R company located in Los Angeles, specializing in doing what the labels “used to do”, artist development and promotion.  (They’re the nice folks who played a key role in breaking artists like Katy Perry, Adele, Coldplay, Train, and Jessie J.)  Some of the money will be spent going back in the studio with Brian finishing new tracks, some for radio promotion, and the balance will be used for tour support and merchandise.

Your support and partnership is the only way I can keep making music and keep this dream alive.  And speaking of dreams, I am lucky enough to have teamed up with Huddl.org and its founder Josh Rizzo.  I am doing this campaign not only for myself, but to help them raise awareness about their organization.  Huddl.org provides an anonymous social community open to all, presented by PTSD UNITED, providing help, support and resources for sufferers of PTSD, their friends and family.  Think of Facebook, but with WAY more potential to help people rather than just play Candy Crush and Farmville.

I am going to raise the bar this time around when it comes to thanking you for your support.  Amazing exclusives not only for you, but for those men and women who went into harms way to defend our freedom.  You may designate that a gift box, sent on your behalf, be sent to active duty and deployed soldiers that contain basic, everyday items we take for granted such as soap, candy, toothbrushes, toothpaste... and even coffee.  I mean, doesn’t everyone deserve to taste The Cat Room coffee?!  It’s a way to “pay it forward” with just one contribution, helping more than just myself.  You can also get Rob Michaels and Huddl merch, guitar picks, spend a day in the studio with us, merch bundles… even custom made ammo boxes filled with merch and other goodies… and obviously, the music.  And it should go without saying that we will communicate often, providing you updates throughout to keep you involved.

Any donation amount is greatly appreciated.  And you know how else you can help?  Talk about this project.  Help us publicize this by sharing your support on all social media – especially Facebook and Twitter.  Scream it from mountain tops.  Tell the world how we’re working together to get some great music out to everyone and help soldiers at the same time!

So, what do you say?  Partners?

story:
In the early nineties, Helva Peters often sang at conventions in the northeast and MASSFILC gatherings. At the time she had a very impressive voice and gave a moving interpretation to her own songs as well as songs by others. She can be heard on the Wail Songs tapes Shoot the Moon, The Programmer and the Elves, and Let's Have a Filk Sing, as well as the CD set Balticon Tapes (all out of print). Since then, various health issues, particularly Multiple Chemical Sensitivity aka Toxin-Induced Loss of Tolerance, have taken their toll on her, though she still sometimes comes to filksings.

Things have lately taken a more serious turn with her; she now has Stage IV cancer, and family sources are advancing her money for a trip to Tijuana, where she believes a treatment not available in the US will be more helpful to her. She'll be piling up a lot of expenses and would like to be able to return at least some of that money.

At the same time, it would be a wonderful thing if more of her old recordings became better known to filkers. This project's goal is to produce a CD from them and raise money that will help her meet her expenses. Harold Stein will produce the CD. All proceeds after costs of materials, which will be minimal, will go to Helva.

Stretch goal! If the campaign raises $2,000, the CD will come with original cover art by Leslie Fish! This will also be available if you choose the download version.

She'll be piling up a lot of expenses and would like to be able to return at least some of that money.At the same time, it would be a wonderful thing if more of her old recordings became better known to filkers. This project's goal is to produce a CD from them and raise money that will help her meet her expenses. Harold Stein will produce the CD. All proceeds after costs of materials, which will be minimal, will go to Helva.Stretch goal! If the campaign raises $2,000, the CD will come with original cover art by Leslie Fish! This will also be available if you choose the download version.

story:
-------------------------------------ENGLISH (Italian Below)------------------------------------


IF YOU HAVE TROUBLES WITH THE PAYMENT ONLINE: CONTACT Emanuele BOZZINI and we will arrange in another way.


Hi! We are Marichka Connection italo-belgian Folk-Rock storytellers born from the melting pot of the belgian capital and a bit of italian background.  With plenty of Brasseries gigs since 2010, we have shared our energy on stages like the Assisi Festival, The Ferrara Buskers Festival, The Antitapas Nights, and on several stages and festivals of Netherland, France and Italy.

After 6 years of musical and personal growth we are finally ready to present our first album "Fuga dal Paradiso" that will be launched in Brussels on the 16th of June!

Now we want to produce two new music videoclips about two songs of the album....but we spent all our money in the preparation of the album!  :(

....That's why we are asking for your support!

Why 2 new videoclips?

5 years ago a good friend supported us in the preparation of the videoclip Il Barone Rampante . It was an amazing experience with an amazing result. We realised then that videos are in the blood of our songs full of stories and images.

Videos are also the best way to promote our newborn album. We would like to make as many videos as there are songs in the album, but with a limited budget we think that we can make only two videos that keep the quality of their "ancestor".

Be the producer of our new videos

Each video will cost us around 1.500 euros. With a team of special and very motivated people we can make a fantastic videoclip out of this little budget.

We are already shooting the first one with the following costs:

- Director: 450 euro

- Animation: 600 euro

- Cameraman with top equipment: 200 euro

- Editor: 150 euro

- Casting: 50 euro

- Shooting catering for 25 people: 100 euro

- Scenography; 150 euro

If you will support us you will make it possible to finalise this and the next one that will have probably a smaller budget due to the absence of an animation part.

What do you you get in exchange? 

Once you will participate to this crowdfunding campaign you will enter in the magic circle of the producers of Marichka Connection: first of all, we will decide together the song of the second video.

Depending on the amount you will devote to our cause you will receive also a different gift in exchange. The gifts are described in the column here on the right and all of them include a virtual or a phisical copy of "Fuga dal Paradiso"!

Fuga dal Paradiso

"Fuga dal Paradiso" is our newborn album. It is the biography of the escape from a golden cage, similar to the one made by “Il Barone Rampante” the character of the first single launched in radio in 2014 and already broadcasted by Radio Nostalgie Belgique and by hundred of local radios in Italy. (link to press kit).

You can hear a preview of the album on soundcloud

16th of June: Launch of the Album

We will make an official presentation of the album on the 16th of June in Brussels. If you will participate to this crowdfunding campaign you will have a free entrance to the presentation and, during the evening you will receive also the personal gift!

For people who live in Italy, we are planning a second tour for next August, plus two presentations in Torino and in Rome next September and we may meet somewhere around our trips. We will in any case send you the gift by mail without any additional cost!

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for your time and thanks for your contributions!

If you can't contribute, please share the link to this campaign with everyone you can think of, by social media, email, or word of mouth!

We hope you will enjoy our new album, Fuga dal Paradiso!


-----------------------------------------------ITALIANO------------------------------------------------------


SE AVETE PROBLEMI CON IL SISTEMA DI PAGAMENTO ONLINE: CONTATTA Emanuele BOZZINI e ci arrangiamo in un altro modo.


Ciao! Siamo i Marichka Connection band folk-rock italo-belga nata dal melting-pot della capitale Belga e da un leggero background cantautoriale italiano.  Dopo moltissimi concerti in tutte le brasseries di Bruxelles, abbiamo, piu recentemente, partecipato a eventi come l'Assisi Festival, il Ferrara Buskers Festival, le Antitapas Nights e abbiamo suonato in svariati altri festival di Francia, Olanda e Italia.

Dopo 6 anni di crescita musicale e personale siamo finalmente pronti a presentare il nostro primo album "Fuga dal Paradiso" che sarà lanciato ufficialmente a Bruxelles il 16 Giugno prossimo!

Ora, vogliamo produrre due nuovi videoclips su due canzoni dell'album.....ma abbiamo speso tutti i soldi nella preparazione dell'album! :(

....ecco perchè stiamo chiedendo il tuo supporto!

Perchè 2 nuovi videoclips?

5 anni fa, un nostro buon amico ci finanziò la produzione del video  Il Barone Rampante .  É stata un'esperienza formidabile che ha portato ad un risultato formidabile. Ci siamo allora resi conto che i video sono nel sangue delle nostre canzoni piene di storie e immagini.

I video sono anche il modo migliore per promuovere il nostro nuovo album.  Vorremmo fare un video per ogni canzone dell'album, ma, con un budget limitato, crediamo realisticamente di poterne realizzare soltanto due che mantengano gli standard del loro "antenato".

Sii produttore dei nostri nuovi video 

Ogni video ci costerà all'incirca 1.500 euro. Con un team di persone speciali e ben motivate possiamo trasformare un budget limitato in qualcosa di veramente magico.

Noi stiamo già girando il primo dei due video con i seguenti costi:

- Regista: 450 euro

- Direttore Animazione: 600 euro

- Cameraman con materiale professionale: 200 euro

- Editor: 150 euro

- Casting: 50 euro

- Catering per 25 persone per il giorno di riprese: 100 euro

- Scenografia: 150 euro

Se ci supporterai ci permetterai di finalizzare questo e un secondo video che avrà probabilmente un budget piu ridotto a causa dell'assenza di una parte animata.

Che cosa riceverai in cambio? 

Una volta che contribuirai a questa campagna di crowdfunding entrerai a fare parte del cerchio magico dei produttori dei Marichka Connection: innanzitutto, decideremo insieme la canzone del secondo video.

A seconda della contribuzione specifica che farai alla nostra causa, riceverai anche uno specifico regalo in cambio. I regali sono descritti nella colonna in alto a destra e tutti includono una copia virtuale e/o fisica di "Fuga dal Paradiso".

Fuga dal Paradiso

"Fuga dal Paradiso" è il nostro nuovo album, fresco di stampa. É la biografia emotiva di una fuga da una gabbia dorata, simile a quella intrapresa dal “Il Barone Rampante” il personaggio del primo singolo lanciato in radio nel 2014 e già trasmesso da Radio Nostaglie Belgio e da centinaia di radio locali italiane. (Link a cartella stampa)

Puoi sentire una preview dell'album su soundcloud.

16 Giugno: Lancio dell'album

Faremo una presentazione ufficale dell'album il 16 giugno a Bruxelles. Se parteciperai a questa campagna di crowdfunding, avrai libero accesso alla serata di presentazione dove potrai anche ritirare il regalo di ringraziamento.

Per tutti coloro che vivono in Italia, stiamo pianificando un secondo tour per la penisola ad Agosto oltre ad una presentazione a Torino e a Roma verso settembre e potremmo incontrarci lungo i nostri pellegrinaggi. Ad ogni modo, vi spediremo il regalo a casa per posta, senza costi aggiuntivi.

Altri modi in cui puoi aiutarci

Ti ringraziamo per il tempo e per le eventuali contribuzioni!

Se non puoi contribuire, per favore condividi il link a questa campagna con chiunque pensi possa essere interessato, tramite social media, email o per passaparola!

Noi speriamo che il nostro nuovo album, Fuga dal Paradiso, ti doni emozioni positive!

story:
Biography

For fans of the song and how to feel it. Kath Bloom (USA) is some kind of legend. She comes from a special place where country, blues and folk are made beautifully translucent and emotive. She has a special gift ï¿½ her delicate, tender voice yet she retains that raw emotion and hard worn truths that allows each sung word to be felt.

The more you hear Kath Bloom, the more you notice itï¿½s not just the arresting voice, but the power of the songwriting. ï¿½Beautifulï¿½ is the typical responseï¿½the kind of beauty that comes from truth, musical and the deeply lyrical. There are no good comparisons, but if you like the deep well of Emmylou Harris, the more poignant lyrics of Lou Reed, the joy of Maher Shalal Hash Baz or even Joni Mitchell your kinda in the right zone. In reality, sheï¿½s simply Kath Bloom: horse whisperer, vocalist, mum, songwriter and a beautiful person.

Her albums recorded with Loren Mazzacane Connors in the 70?s/80?s are rare things, full of songs that float and melt into the ether. Impossibly beautiful and hard to find on LP, but check the reissues from a few years ago . In the 90?s Kathï¿½s music was famously featured in Richard Linklaterï¿½s film Before Sunrise. Since then she has been busy writing and recording to great acclaim. Two new albums in the last few years and she and her songs where also honored on a tribute album featuring Bill Callahan, Scout Niblett and Mark Kozelek.

Pitchfork, the influential online music publication, had this to say about Kathï¿½s last record:  ï¿½Bloom sounds like a woman who has spent years in the wildernessï¿½ An earthy, unpretentious presence, she can snap a heart like a twigï¿½

 

The Goal

The goal of this campaign, simply stated, is to raise funds to help Kath Bloom record her new record.  Kath is coming to Los Angeles to record her new tunes.  The idea is to go into the studio with her friends and do what Kath does best, make honest music from the heart.  Kath is joining up with a cast of musicians, mostly under the age of 30, whom she has meet touring the U.S. over the past few years.  This new energy with wisdom is a sound I'm so eager to hear and participate in.

 

The Rewards

Of course there is no greater reward than knowing that you are helping an artist accomplish their vision, but in addition to that Kath has arranged some really special one of a kind gifts for those of you who choose to contribute.  She has some really raw self-recorded unreleased tracks that she will e-mail in mp3 form to entry level donors, hand written lyrics and/or hand written poems to mid level donors, for the dedicated Kath Bloom fan a super rare and I mean RARE authentic original ï¿½Restless, Faithful, Desperateï¿½ LP from the early 1980ï¿½s, and the grand prize for the high rollers will be an original one of a kind framed Kath Bloom Painting.

 

Thanks in advance to everyone for your help, catch you on the flip side!

 

 

-The Boom Team!

 

Kath Bloom (The source of it all?)

Levi Strom (friend, musician, vibe keeper)

Chiz (agent)

Dean (legal council, friend)

Mike Harrington (video editor, executive producer,)

Jim Reynolds (Recording engineer, musician, friend)
